<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email">
    <sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <blind_copied/>
        <body><html><head><style>
	#snc_notification_preference {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	
	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
</style>

</head><body><p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Hi &nbsp;ASHIK ,</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">&nbsp;A Choice has been requested to create and requires your review and approval. Below are the details.<br><br> Action : create<br>Table : u_appraisal<br>Field : u_module&nbsp;</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

<br><br>

<a id="snc_notification_unsubscribe" href="mailto:zyndertechtest@gmail.com?subject=Unsubscribe from &quot;Choice Configuration Approval&quot;&amp;body=Sending this email with the predefined content in the subject and body will unsubscribe you from the notification &quot;Choice Configuration Approval&quot;%0D%0A%0D%0AUnsubscribe:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;8049e2dbc3cc621052237405e4013135&quot;,&quot;token&quot;:&quot;c797e62132&quot;}">Unsubscribe</a> | <a id="snc_notification_preference" href="https://dev240427.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=notification_preferences.do%3Fsysparm_notification=8049e2dbc3cc621052237405e4013135">Notification Preferences</a><div>&nbsp;</div><div style="display:inline">Ref:MSG0003302_a0xKP1z3kV8KZF9fozUb</div></body></html></body>
        <body_text/>
        <checkpoint>0</checkpoint>
        <content_type>text/html</content_type>
        <copied/>
        <deleted>false</deleted>
        <direct>krishnarajzynder@gmail.com</direct>
        <error_string/>
        <headers>Date: Mon, 10 Mar 2025 00:55:53 -0700 (PDT)
From: Zynder Tech Test <zyndertechtest@gmail.com>

Precedence: bulk
Auto-Submitted: auto-generated
X-ServiceNow-Generated: true</headers>
